snippet: After deciding not to prosecute Goldman Sachs for its conduct during the financial crisis, the Justice Department did something rare: it publicly announced that the investigation was closed.
abstract: After deciding not to prosecute Goldman Sachs for its conduct during the financial crisis, the Justice Department did something rare: it publicly announced that the investigation was closed.

headline.main: U.S. Goldman Disclosure a Rare Break in Secrecy
headline.print_headline: U.S. Goldman Disclosure A Rare Break in Secrecy
